    • Method Detail

      • getRules

        public java.lang.String getRules()

        Returns:

      • performMove

        public KalahariFieldsMove performMove(KalahariFieldsMove selectedMove)
        Performs a players move: takes all tokens/mussels from the field the player chose to draw from (KalahariFieldsMove private variable fieldToMove) and spreads content to subsequent fields by adding one token/mussel to each.
        Parameters:
        selectedMove - object of class KalahariFieldsMove) containing fields, fieldToMove, playerToDraw and moveReturnCode prior to move.
        • 0 ... error: selected Field outside allowed range (0..4 and 6..10)
        • 1 ... success: Successful move; other player's turn now.
        • 2 ... success: Successful move; same player moves again.
        • 3 ... success: Successful move; game over.
        Returns:
        KalahariFieldsMove containing data (see above) after move

      • getMoveReturnMessage

        public java.lang.String getMoveReturnMessage(int performMoveReturnCode)
        Returns human readable error or success messages for the requested error/success code.
        Parameters:
        performMoveReturnCode - Code for that a human readable message is requested
        Returns:
        human readable error or success message.
